title: Żejtun (Zejtun) Roman Villa
description: Remains of a large villa or estate of the Roman period (ancient name unknown) were discovered in the town of Żejtun on the island of Malta.

properties.description: Remains of a Roman Villa, reported by search in Google Earth with the subtitle "Dun Gwann Tabone, Iż-Żejtun, Malta". Verified in Google Earth in November 2012 with reference to photographs on the website of the Zejtun Roman Villa Project. Dates after BAtlas.
properties.title: Zejtun Roman Villa Remains
